title: Solum Cafe
typeOfFood: Ovo, Japanese, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. One person restaurant with only two real dishes on the menu, one of which is vegan - a curry with minced soy and lots of roasted vegetables. Also has a salad that might be vegan; please inquire. Drinks include smoothies, tea and coffee. Everything is freshly prepared as you watch.
